seo.title: Digital Marketing Services — MapleGrowth Digital | Growth Marketing Agency
seo.description: Comprehensive digital marketing services including SEO, PPC, web development, content marketing, and brand strategy. Canadian agency focused on measurable growth.

hero.title: Digital Marketing Services That Drive Growth
hero.subhead: Comprehensive marketing solutions for small businesses and scale-ups.
hero.body: From SEO and PPC to web development and brand strategy — our integrated approach delivers measurable results across every touchpoint of your customer journey.

cta.label: Book a Strategy Call
cta.ariaLabel: Book a strategy call to discuss your marketing needs

intro.title: Why Our Services Work
intro.subtitle: As a Canadian online marketing company, we help small businesses and scale-ups win with strategy, creativity, and technology.
intro.body: Every project — big or small — gets the same focus: fast performance, strong security, and mobile-ready experiences. We don't just deliver campaigns; we build sustainable growth engines.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Full-service digital marketing solutions designed for growth.

items.title: SEO & Analytics
items.description: Technical SEO, on-page optimization, content strategy, and analytics that compound results.

items.title: PPC & Paid Media
items.description: ROI-first campaigns across Google, YouTube, and social. Built for fast, measurable growth.

items.title: Web Design & Development
items.description: Conversion-focused, accessible websites engineered for speed, security, and scalability.

items.title: Content & Email Marketing
items.description: Editorial calendars, sales enablement content, and lifecycle email that nurtures demand.

items.title: Brand & Creative
items.description: Brand systems, ad creative, and motion assets that boost recognition and conversion.

items.title: Growth Strategy
items.description: Positioning, messaging, and go-to-market plans tailored to small business digital marketing.

process.title: How We Deliver Results
process.subtitle: Our proven 4-step process ensures every service delivers measurable growth.

steps.title: Discovery & Strategy
steps.description: We start with deep research into your business, market, and customers to create a data-driven growth plan.

steps.title: Setup & Launch
steps.description: We implement campaigns, build systems, and create assets with meticulous attention to performance and conversion.

steps.title: Monitor & Optimize
steps.description: Continuous monitoring and testing ensure peak performance across all channels and touchpoints.

steps.title: Scale & Grow
steps.description: As results prove successful, we scale winning strategies and expand into new channels for sustained growth.

testimonial.quote: The results speak for themselves. MapleGrowth Digital doesn't just manage our marketing — they drive our business growth.
testimonial.author: Michael Chen

cta.title: Ready to Scale Your Business?
cta.body: Let's discuss which services will drive the biggest impact for your business goals.
